conversations.conversation: hi!everybody,i am miuanne,you are all welcome, come let me be your every one's friend......i am just a new one here, i hope that everybody will be my friend.....

LOVE....is to forgive,to understnd,to share,love is thoughtfulness,honest...love can see even the blind,love can move mountain...love can make you smile,laugh,sad.can make you cry.,,that is what is LOVE...you fill my heart with happiness,each moment that we share,and every day'smore wonderful just knowing that you care,though i often fail to say what's always in my heart ,i hope you know my feeling that no words could quite convey all the deep affection,that is in my heart always...... i love you who do you are,i love you what ever you are,i love you with all my heart,forever you will be my only LOVE.......thank you for your kindness...thank you for your tenderness...thank you for your smile....and most of all thank you for your LOVE...and you're always there ....forever stand by my side.
